Name: Easy Sketch Pose
About the game: Easy Sketch Pose is a human posing and drawing all-in-one app designed for people who want to draw with good 3d reference for anatomy and perspective. Pose characters and static objects in the 3d layer and draw in 2d layers over the perfectly posed character with easy to use controls and seamless switching between 2d and layers. SETUP COMPLEX LAYOOUTS Setup complex layouts easily by importing in external OBJ files, changing lighting and using different visual modes to get a wide variety of looks. Play with light and shadows to get beautiful compositions, add a wide variety of 40 bundled 3d models from airplanes to buildings for complex scenes. POSE AND DRAW Have you ever wanted a professional model who would perform a variety of poses to make drawing animation, illustrations, and sketching easier? By manipulating the 3D model on the screen, you can create poses seen in everyday life, sports, martial arts, etc., and then draw on a seperate layer for getting the right proportions and perspective. ADD BACKGROUND DETAIL Add background details easily by importing in .OBJ files into the 3d layer and merge it seamlessly into the main 2d scene. Use the inbuilt models of 3d cities, vehicles, other primitives to add complexity to your compositions. FEATURES *Seamlessy add 2d layers so that you can paint non-destructively with a pen tablet and easily adjustable pressure settings *An innovative hand editor allows users to get precise hand poses whilst intuitive camera controls lets users easily setup complex 3d scenes *Export out layers as .PNG files ,so users can preserve details in layers and making color separation easy. *Import in external 3d meshes using the OBJ format to easily add background details *40 models of buildings, cties ,vehicles, primitives and assorted props are bundled in the app for fast layouts *Intuitive controllers and transform manipulators allows users to easily pose their characters in 3d space *Layer control allows users to add multiple transparent 2d layers on the existing 3d layer *You can load in a total of 5 different characters ranging from normal proportions to stylized anime in order to get the right body shape and style *Control lighting and shading modes so you can switch between looks like toon shaded and black/white noir easily EXAMPLE SCENES
